results.title: [Viana Stern]
results.brief_description:
A U.F.O visits the Sydney Harbour Bridge; a Japanese tourist takes photos; a person meditates; people exercise and a plane flys by.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: [Tom Hughes]
results.brief_description:
An old pirate sailing ship violently attacks dolphins and seagulls at sea but encounters trouble when bombed by another pirate ship.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: [Sophie Richardson]
results.brief_description:
A female kookaburra comes to feed her babies worms, before leading them to fly down to the park and feed on a human’s picnic!

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: Memory packs
results.brief_description:
This CD-ROM was created with funding by the Commonwealth Government through the Australia council - its arts and funding advisory body, and by the City of Port Philip Cultural Development Fund.
The work is an interactive exhibition of objects that evoke stories or memories. Young people, old people, people from diverse backgrounds, artists, entertainers, the famous, the infamous and the not yet discovered - all were asked to contribute an object of personal significance and a story to accompany it. The CD-ROM has a linked website (www.experimenta.org/gallery/memorypacks/description.html).

results.title: [Ryo Parker]
results.brief_description:
A sailor experiences a huge fire and subsequent sinking of his sailing ship after he hits a large rock. A fish saves him as he nearly drowns. Once on shore, the sailor goes to the shipyards and purchases another ship and sails off into sea.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: [Nicolas Bethune]
results.brief_description:
A U.F.O comes down to visit the Murray River Queen, alias “SS Nicolas” and proceeds to put a spell on a passenger who is eerily altered by the experience.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: [Nick Nolan]
results.brief_description:
An Olympic soccer player dives out of an Australian stamp to score a goal but hits his head on a rock and dies. People weep for him at his funeral.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

group.title: Stamps coming to life: Anderson Creek Primary School

results.title: Animated Stamp - [Mitchell Gaffney]
results.brief_description: Asked to “make a stamp come to life”. Mitchell has created a vibrant, multicolored traffic flow in a stamp featuring Sydney Harbour Bridge. The price of the stamp rises as the increase of traffic flow occurs across the bridge. Highly Commended. An animated short entered to ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.
